title: 5 Years After the Crash: Chris Froome Holding Out for a Tour de France Return
content:
A half decade after the crash that forever marked Froome's career, the desire to return to the Tour de France pushes him on: 'I am doing everything I can to get myself ready.'

Read the full article at 5 Years After the Crash: Chris Froome Holding Out for a Tour de France Return on Velo.
author: ahood
